wikipedia_page.main:
Adam James Watts (born 4 March 1988) is an English footballer who plays as a defender and most recently played for Eastbourne Borough.
He has previously played for Fulham, Milton Keynes Dons and Northampton Town, Lincoln City and Gainsborough Trinity.

response: Straker made his debut for the England national under-18 team in a 1–0 away defeat to Turkey in a friendly on 17 November 2005, and he was substituted for Chris Riley in the 77th minute. He gained one more cap, playing in a 2–1 home win over Slovenia in another friendly on 17 April 2006, being substituted for Adam Watts at half-time. In January 2008, Straker was called up to the Barbados national team for the upcoming CONCACAF First Round qualifier for the 2010 FIFA World Cup against Dominica, though he did not play.
| Adam WattsAdam Watts was due to return in November 2009, but extended his loan until 2 January 2010.
